name: Cozy The Cat
description:
You are alone and you have to survive until 12 AM

your parents will get home soon

Move with WASD

Interact with Left mouse click or E

Santa can't move if you're watching him

Make sure to feed your cat

And close the windows as the weather is so cold

Credits

Timmy model from Mixamo.com

Dark Santa Claus Low Poly by Gustavo.Banck

Scottish Fold with 2 removed backgrounds by dinomaster

Capurrrcino! by The Vaudeville Horror

Window by JeanLescano

Christmas Dinner by Julia Lemke

Christmas Tree by Julia Lemke

Music by Grand_Project from Pixabay
